scripts.start: concurrently --names="evaluation-engine,serve-plugins,browser" "pnpm run evaluation-engine" "pnpm run serve-plugins" "cross-env EVALUATION_ENGINE_URL=http://localhost:9000 pnpm --filter browser run serve" --kill-others
scripts.electron:static: concurrently --names="evaluation-engine,electron" --kill-others "pnpm run evaluation-engine" "cross-env EVALUATION_ENGINE_URL=http://localhost:9000 pnpm --filter electron run electron:static"
scripts.electron:dev: concurrently --names="evaluation-engine,serve-plugins,electron" --kill-others "pnpm run evaluation-engine" "pnpm run serve-plugins" "cross-env EVALUATION_ENGINE_URL=http://localhost:9000 pnpm --filter electron run electron:dev"
scripts.ballons-tool:dev: pnpm run icons:generate && pnpm --filter ballons-tool run dev
scripts.build-tauri: pnpm run package-eval-engine && pnpm --filter tauri run build
scripts.build-tauri-debug: pnpm run package-eval-engine && pnpm --filter tauri run build-debug
